languages.text: {n}Сложно сказать, чем была операция, которой подвергся Паскаль — пыткой, процедурой священного аугментирования или вивисекцией. Его плоть покрыта свежими швами и ранами, которые никто не удосужился зашить. Обычный человек уже давно истек бы кровью, но священное железо поддерживает жизнь в теле адепта Бога-Машины. Металлические внутренности техножреца явлены миру в бесстыдной и кровавой наготе.{/n}

{n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сложно сказать, чем была операция, которой подвергся Паскаль — пыткой, процедурой священного аугментирования или вивисекцией. Его плоть покрыта свежими швами и ранами, которые никто не удосужился зашить. Обычный человек уже давно истек бы кровью, но священное железо поддерживает жизнь в теле адепта Бога-Машины. Металлические внутренности техножреца явлены миру в бесстыдной и кровавой наготе.{/n}

His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to sew up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in a vulgar and bloody display of nudity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルの受けた処置が拷問なのか、聖なる増強なのか、生体解剖なのか、判断するのは難しい。彼の肉体は、誰も縫おうとしなかった傷、縫合したての傷で覆われている。普通の人間ならとっくに失血死しているはずだが、フェルム・サンクトゥムは機械神の崇拝者たちの肉体を支えている。彼の金属製の内部は、下品で血まみれの裸体で目にさらされる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの受けた処置が拷問なのか、聖なる増強なのか、生体解剖なのか、判断するのは難しい。彼の肉体は、誰も縫おうとしなかった傷、縫合したての傷で覆われている。普通の人間ならとっくに失血死しているはずだが、フェルム・サンクトゥムは機械神の崇拝者たちの肉体を支えている。彼の金属製の内部は、下品で血まみれの裸体の見せしめとしてさらされる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}很难说帕斯卡经历的手术究竟是酷刑，还是神圣的植入过程，抑或是活体解剖。他的肉体上覆满了新鲜的缝线，点缀着完全没有仔细缝合好的伤口。若换成了普通人，恐怕此刻早已失血过多而死了，但帕斯卡的钢铁圣所却依然维持着万机之神这位仆人的性命。他的金属内脏被彻底暴露在外，上面沾满了鲜血，看起来粗陋不堪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很难说帕斯卡经历的手术究竟是酷刑，还是神圣的植入过程，抑或是活体解剖。他的肉体上覆满了新鲜的缝线，点缀着完全没有仔细缝合好的伤口。若换成了普通人，恐怕此刻早已失血过多而死了，但帕斯卡的钢铁圣所却依然维持着万机之神这位仆人的性命。他的金属内脏被彻底暴露在外，上面沾满了鲜血，看起来粗陋不堪。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es difícil decir si el procedimiento al que ha sido sometido Pasqal ha sido tortura, aumento sagrado o vivisección. Su carne está cubierta de suturas frescas entremezcladas con heridas que nadie se ha tomado la molestia de suturar. Un humano normal se habría desangrado hace tiempo, pero el Ferrum Sanctum mantiene los cuerpos de los adeptos del Dios Máquina. Sus entrañas metálicas están expuestas a la vista en un vulgar y sangriento alarde de desnudez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es difícil decir si el procedimiento al que ha sido sometido Pasqal ha sido tortura, aumento sagrado o vivisección. Su carne está cubierta de suturas frescas entremezcladas con heridas que nadie se ha tomado la molestia de suturar. Un humano normal se habría desangrado hace tiempo, pero el Ferrum Sanctum mantiene los cuerpos de los adeptos del Dios Máquina. Sus entrañas metálicas están expuestas a la vista en un vulgar y sangriento alarde de desnudez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob die Prozedur, die Pasqal über sich ergehen lassen musste, Folter war, heilige Augmentation oder eine Vivisektion. Sein Fleisch ist mit frischen Nähten übersät, dazwischen liegen Wunden, bei denen sich keiner die Mühe gemacht hat, sie wieder zuzunähen. Ein gewöhnlicher Mensch wäre längst verblutet, doch das Ferrum Sanctum gibt den Körpern von Adepten des Maschinengottes Kraft. Sein metallisches Inneres ist auf vulgäre und blutige Weise bloßgestellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob die Prozedur, die Pasqal über sich ergehen lassen musste, Folter war, heilige Augmentation oder Vivisektion. Sein Fleisch ist mit frischen Nähten übersät, dazwischen liegen Wunden, bei denen sich keiner die Mühe gemacht hat, sie wieder zuzunähen. Ein gewöhnlicher Mensch wäre längst verblutet, doch das Ferrum Sanctum gibt den Körpern von Adepten des Maschinengotts Kraft. Sein metallisches Inneres ist auf vulgäre und blutige Weise offengelegt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Difficile de dire si Pasqal a subi des tortures, une augmentation sacrée ou une vivisection. Sur sa chair, les points de suture côtoient des blessures suppurantes que personne n'a pris la peine de suturer. Un être humain ordinaire se serait depuis longtemps vidé de son sang, mais les adeptes du Dieu-Machine peuvent compter sur le Ferrum Sanctum pour les maintenir en vie. Ses entrailles métalliques exposées offrent un spectacle aussi répugnant que sanglant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Difficile de dire si Pasqal a subi des tortures, une augmentation sacrée ou une vivisection. Sur sa chair, les points de suture côtoient des blessures suppurantes que personne n'a pris la peine de suturer. Un humain ordinaire se serait depuis longtemps vidé de son sang, mais les adeptes du Dieu-Machine peuvent compter sur le Ferrum Sanctum pour les maintenir en vie. Les entrailles exposées de Pasqal offrent un spectacle aussi répugnant que sanglant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın işkenceye mi, kutsal bir ogmentasyona mı yoksa dirikesime mi maruz kaldığını çözmek kolay iş değil. Vücudunu saran taze dikişlerin arasında kimsenin zahmet edip dikiş atmadığı yaralar görülüyor. Sıradan bir insan olsaydı çoktan kan kaybından ölmüştü ancak Makine Tanrı'nın üstatları, Demir Kutak sayesinde yaşamlarını idame ettirebilir. Pasqal'ın metal iç organlarının kaba ve kanlı çıplaklığı göze çarpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if the procedure that Pasqal has undergone was torture, sacred augmentation, or vivisection. His flesh is covered in fresh sutures interspersed with wounds that no one has taken the trouble to stitch up. An ordinary human would have long since bled out, but the Ferrum Sanctum sustains the bodies of the adepts of the Machine God. His metallic insides are exposed to the eye in all their vulgar and bloody nakedness.{/n}
